attributes.action: ask the EU to remove the ban on mishapen apples and other fruits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU said recently it would remove the ban on mishapen fruit due to the appaling waste of food.. However this does not include apples, lettuces, lemons and ten other fruits and vegetables. This refusal to lift the ban on these items does not make sense when the world will soon be suffering food shortages.
